details: It's a full-stack gamespace website built by the five of us. where you can create an account and log in as a user. You can play games and add some games, but if you want to download games, you have to pay. You can save your favorite games if you wish to and can view all orders. Here you can create meetings, share meeting screens, and join others. can be streamed and shared live if needed. You can connect to someone's profile if you want. You can post, comment, like, delete, and edit comments. In this project, I worked on the navbar, login registration, and game details pages. working on updating my profile. The project is fully responsive for mobile devices, tablets, and desktops. I have made a snake game and a Tetris game, which can be played here.
technology: JavaScript, React, React Router, Materia-Ui, Socket.io Redux.js, Firebase, Authentication, Stripe, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB.

details: A full-stack second-hand car web app where you can create your user profile and log in. Some items can be booked, deleted, and paid for as reserved items. You can see your order. Those users have admin access. They can view all users and delete other users if needed.
technology: JavaScript, React.js, Router, Firebase Authentication, Stripe, Node.js, Express, cors

details: A full-stack dentist expert website where you can create your user profile, log in as a user, input some data, and update your existing data. You can book an appointment and download the PDF. You can delete your data and see others' data, but you canâ€™t edit or delete their data.
technology: JavaScript, React.js, Router, Firebase Authentication, Stripe, Node.js, Express, cors
